metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21471 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: Vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox product of Oracle Virtualization(component: Core). The supported version that is affected is Prior to6.1.34. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attackerwith logon to the infrastructure where Oracle VM VirtualBox executes tocompromise Oracle VM VirtualBox. While the vulnerability is in Oracle VMVirtualBox, attacks may significantly impact additional products (scopechange). Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result inunauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash(complete DOS) of Oracle VM VirtualBox. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.5(Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: virtualbox package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
vm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
